      • from

        public static RevisionInfoDTO from​(CustomRevisionEntity revisionEntity,
                                   java.util.Map<org.hibernate.envers.RevisionType,​java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> changes)
        Create a RevisionInfoDTO from a CustomRevisionEntity and a set of changes grouped by revision type.

        This method is convenient when using a CustomRevisionEntity in combination with CrossTypeRevisionChangesReader. The Map will be transformed so changes are additionally grouped by class name.

        Parameters:
        revisionEntity - the revision entity
        changes - the changes
        Returns:
        the RevisionInfoDTO object
